reviewtext: If you don't mind looking like you should be listening to a Tears for Fears cassette on your enormous Walkman, these are fantastic especially for the price. Lightweight and comfortable with bass response you shouldn't be able to reasonably expect from open air type headphones, especially at this price point. I don't mind the eighties look to them, they rock in any decade. But tomorrow i do think I'll run in enormous striped tube socks pulled up to my knees, just to complete the look.
